forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 2am and 5am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before noon, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 76. South southeast wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 5am. Cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. West northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 56. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers between 8am and 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 54. North wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
